01 About Us

THE ALTMAN
BROTHERS

The Altman Brothers are among the top producing real estate agents in the country. Josh and Matt Altman managed to carve out a niche in the Los Angeles high end market. This includes staking claim to top tinsel town turf in the Platinum Triangle of Beverly Hills, Bel-Air, and Holmby Hills, and everywhere from Malibu to the Hollywood Hills and Downtown LA. Together they have seasoned experience and ability to foster solid relationships. The Altman Brothers are full-service real estate experts who strive to service the entire spectrum of exclusive clients Los Angeles has to offer. Altman clients are luxury buyers and high-end sellers: entertainers, professional athletes and high-net- worth individuals whose real estate holdings dot the globe, to clients with small family homes and short sale needs.

READ MORE

[home_slider_main_section]

01 About Us

THE ALTMAN BROTHERS

The Altman Brothers are among the top producing real estate agents in the country. Josh and Matt Altman managed to carve out a niche in the Los Angeles high end market. This includes staking claim to top tinsel town turf in the Platinum Triangle of Beverly Hills, Bel-Air, and Holmby Hills, and everywhere from Malibu to the Hollywood Hills and Downtown LA. Together they have seasoned experience and ability to foster solid relationships. The Altman Brothers are full-service real estate experts who strive to service the entire spectrum of exclusive clients Los Angeles has to offer. Altman clients are luxury buyers and high-end sellers: entertainers, professional athletes and high-net- worth individuals whose real estate holdings dot the globe, to clients with small family homes and short sale needs.

READ MORE

03 Tv Show

Million Dollar Listing follows the lives of three of Los Angeles’ hottest, young, and aggressive real estate magnates as they make a fortune selling multi-million dollar properties in the most exclusive neighborhoods- Hollywood, Malibu and Beverly Hills.

Take the NetWorkWise I.Q. Test

Why NetWorkWise?

These calculators below reveal how much you lose financially when your career takes an unexpected turn for the worse. By enrolling in our courses and adopting good networking practices you’ll develop the skills needed to shorten the time your out of work, saving you from the financial uncertainty that comes when you’re looking for a new opportunity.

How much money will you lose when you are out of work?

$80,000

How much money will you lose when you don’t get a promotion?

$80,000

NetWorkWise Essentials

01

Networking 101

02

Networking at a conference or event

03

Networking for introverts

04

Networking to improve the company’s bottom line

05

How to get access to anyone

06

How to sell without selling

ENROLL FOR $299
BEFORE IT GOES UP

Networking 101

“The most valued currency in the world is not the Dollar, Euro, or Yen – it’s relationships.”

___ Harvey Mackay

Book

Workshop Preview

What You’ll Learn

  • What networking is, but more importantly what it’s not!
  • Developing the proper mindset
  • Setting and implementing networking goals and habits
  • Understanding networking fundamentals and social norms
  • Actionable steps and processes to bring your networking skills to the next level

Who It’s For

  • Organizations that believe their people are their greatest asset
  • Individuals who want to learn how to navigate and excel in a corporate environment
  • Companies looking to develop in-house leaders and managers
  • Employees involved in agile cross-functional teams or matrix organizational structures

Techs We Love

Make the difference in a world full of technology.

All about ERP

ONE STOP for all expertise.

WHAT WE DO

  • Web Development
  • Mobile Development
  • UI/UX Design
  • E-commerce Development
  • ERP/CRM Customization
  • QA & Testing

Web Development

responsive web platforms with custom features

We possess an experienced team of software engineers and web developers who have the proficiency to commence any website development including static, dynamic or Content Management Systems (CMS) based application. Our engineers are skilled in building custom themes for a variety of CMSs (Drupal, WordPress, Joomla, etc) and integrating any web application. Besides, we can migrate web applications on demand; such as, migrate from a Drupal based CMS to a WordPress one. Also, our group of experienced programmers can program secured and SEO (Search Engine Optimization) friendly websites.

Read More

Mobile App Development

iOS, Android and cross-platform solutions

We build mobile applications that can support any mobile OS, such as Apple iPhone’s iOS, Android, Windows OS. We have a wide range of mobile engineering services to offer. Most importantly, we work across mobile technologies, both hybrid and native.

Read More

UI/UX Design

web and mobile app design

Our UI/UX team focuses on creating 'user-centered' and mobile-first web design. Our engineers take an in-depth look at specified requirements provided by the customers to design an ideal and organized web application. Our squad is also specialized in crafting functional prototypes that will help our clients to validate product ideas, before they proceed into development/programming phase. Primarily, we work closely with our clients. Since the team knows their customers the best, their input is critical in molding the final design.

Read More

E-commerce Development

Our e-commerce development services include:

At Xplantr, we correlate an exceptional combination of your business goals/objectives and technology to design and develop an outstanding online retail store for you.

Our e-commerce development services include:

  • Extremely creative, outstanding and user-friendly website design
  • Optimization for multi-device (i.e. desktop, mobile and tablet) viewing
  • User-friendly product management system to help you managing your product inventory
  • Highly secured payment gateway and safe shopping cart
  • Modules like shipping, inventory, gift voucher and many more
  • Option to integrate with your existing account software
  • SEO optimized website
Read More

ERP/CRM

ERP/CRM Implementation & Customization

We go through six phases in ERP/CRM Implementation and Customization process. They are as follows:

Read More

QA & Testing

Our primary software testing services includes

Our dedicated Software QA Engineers will ascertain and double-check your application before it gets to the production site. We perform manual/visual test to ensure that there is no abnormality within the application and functional test to provide assurance to all the application features. The cross-browser testing is performed in Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE, etc. to ensure browser compatibility and also in diverse devices to ensure the support for every platform, starting from personal computers to cellular phones and tablets. Moreover, Automation tests are conducted with the help of open source tools such as Selenium to reduce the time for regression tests.

Read More

WHAT WE DO

From investigation to execution, we plan the guide to accomplish the digital transformation of your business with acute adaptability.

  • Enterprise Solutions
  • ERP/CRM Customization
  • Web Development
  • UI/UX Design
  • Mobile Development
  • QA & Testing

Web Development

Also, our group of experienced programmers can program secured and SEO (Search Engine Optimization) friendly websites.

Our e-commerce development services include:

Our e-commerce development services include:

  • Extremely creative, outstanding and user-friendly website design
  • Optimization for multi-device (i.e. desktop, mobile and tablet) viewing
  • User-friendly product management system to help you managing your product inventory

QA & Testing

Our primary software testing services includes

Our dedicated Software QA Engineers will ascertain and double-check your application before it gets to the production site. We perform manual/visual test to ensure that there is no abnormality within the application and functional test to provide assurance to all the application features. The cross-browser testing is performed in Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE, etc. to ensure browser compatibility and also in diverse devices to ensure the support for every platform, starting from personal computers to cellular phones and tablets. Moreover, Automation tests are conducted with the help of open source tools such as Selenium to reduce the time for regression tests.

WHAT WE DO

From investigation to execution, we plan the guide to accomplish the digital transformation of your business with acute adaptability.

  • Enterprise Solutions
  • ERP/CRM Customization
  • Web Development
  • UI/UX Design
  • Mobile Development
  • QA & Testing

Web Development

responsive web platforms with custom features

We possess an experienced team of software engineers and web developers who have the proficiency to commence any website development including static, dynamic or Content Management Systems (CMS) based application. Our engineers are skilled in building custom themes for a variety of CMSs (Drupal, WordPress, Joomla, etc) and integrating any web application. Besides, we can migrate web applications on demand; such as, migrate from a Drupal based CMS to a WordPress one. Also, our group of experienced programmers can program secured and SEO (Search Engine Optimization) friendly websites.

Read More

Mobile App Development

iOS, Android and cross-platform solutions

We build mobile applications that can support any mobile OS, such as Apple iPhone’s iOS, Android, Windows OS. We have a wide range of mobile engineering services to offer. Most importantly, we work across mobile technologies, both hybrid and native.

Read More

UI/UX Design

web and mobile app design

Our UI/UX team focuses on creating 'user-centered' and mobile-first web design. Our engineers take an in-depth look at specified requirements provided by the customers to design an ideal and organized web application. Our squad is also specialized in crafting functional prototypes that will help our clients to validate product ideas, before they proceed into development/programming phase. Primarily, we work closely with our clients. Since the team knows their customers the best, their input is critical in molding the final design.

Read More

Enterprise Solutions

Our e-commerce development services include:

At Xplantr, we correlate an exceptional combination of your business goals/objectives and technology to design and develop an outstanding online retail store for you.

Our e-commerce development services include:

  • Extremely creative, outstanding and user-friendly website design
  • Optimization for multi-device (i.e. desktop, mobile and tablet) viewing
  • User-friendly product management system to help you managing your product inventory
  • Highly secured payment gateway and safe shopping cart
  • Modules like shipping, inventory, gift voucher and many more
  • Option to integrate with your existing account software
  • SEO optimized website
Read More

ERP/CRM

ERP/CRM Implementation & Customization

We go through six phases in ERP/CRM Implementation and Customization process. They are as follows:

Read More

QA & Testing

Our primary software testing services includes

Our dedicated Software QA Engineers will ascertain and double-check your application before it gets to the production site. We perform manual/visual test to ensure that there is no abnormality within the application and functional test to provide assurance to all the application features. The cross-browser testing is performed in Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE, etc. to ensure browser compatibility and also in diverse devices to ensure the support for every platform, starting from personal computers to cellular phones and tablets. Moreover, Automation tests are conducted with the help of open source tools such as Selenium to reduce the time for regression tests.

Read More

Are You Maximizing the Profits of Your Audiology Department?

All of our ENT partners NOW generate over $1,000,000 in Hearing Aid Sales PER CLINIC.

Ask us how we can help double or even triple your Hearing Aid sales during the first year! And we pay you cash up front to do so!

Complete Audiology and Hearing Aid Solutions for Your Practice

Not just a buying group, a true Joint Venture

Business Joint Venture Options

Let us help run the Audiology portion of your practice for you, including Audiologist staffing and cost! We will handle everything from accounting, insurance billing, and financing to marketing, human resources, IT, and sales support. You keep the diagnostic revenue, and we will even pay rent. You direct the business on-site and focus on your patients, and we will serve as your full back-office support system, lifting the practice to its ultimate level of success.

Custom-Tailored Solutions for Your Practice

No two practices are alike, which is why we offer custom-tailored solutions that can be carved into what your individualized needs may be. Want us to just engage in some marketing activity for you? Perhaps you just require some book-keeping/accounting help? We can create the perfect blend of support you need to help you become as successful as possible.

Want to learn more?

Please call or email to schedule a 15-minute meeting.

Please contact:

Michelle Giddings

Vice President of Business Development

616-843-4546

mgiddings@belsonousa.com

Who Should Get Certified?

The NetWorkWise Certification is a gold-standard program and the most comprehensive in the world. This credential is ideal especially for those in positions where cultivating valuable relationships is essential including:

  • Individuals in Leadership Roles
  • Relationship Managers
  • Human Resources Professionals
  • Organizational Developers
  • Sales & Account Managers
  • Entrepreneurs
  • Teachers & Educators
  • Graduate & Undergraduate Students
[show_profile_img]

A Sophisticated Approach
to Building Relationships

Get Certified

Why Get Certified?

The NetWorkWise Certification validates an individual’s accomplishment of being recognized as a leading expert in developing world-class relationships through networking to foster connectivity and improve business worth. It empowers individuals and businesses with the knowledge, habits and confidence to create and nurture expansive personal and professional networks built on deep relationships that instill trust, which results in more valuable and productive employees, and increases tenure, diversity, accountability, collaboration and creativity.


Who Should Get Certified?

The NetWorkWise Certification is a gold-standard program and the most comprehensive in the world. This credential is ideal especially for those in positions where cultivating valuable relationships is essential including:

  • Individuals in Leadership Roles
  • Relationship Managers
  • Human Resources Professionals
  • Organizational Developers
  • Sales & Account Managers
  • Entrepreneurs
  • Teachers & Educators
  • Graduate & Undergraduate Students

Individuals who are NetWorkWise Certified
get things done faster, easier, and better!

Certification Levels

  • Level 1

    NetWorkWise Certified

  • Level 2

    NetWorkWise Certified Professional

  • Level 3

    NetWorkWise Certified Master

  • Level 4

    NetWorkWise Certified Coach

Key Outcomes

  • In-depth understanding of the value of connections and social capital which leads to skillfully growing and nurturing relationships
  • Education in the art and science of networking and the acquisition of skills and knowledge needed to foster exceptional association and to improve business productivity
  • Preparation for the future of work and being effective in agile environments, cross-functional teams, and matrix organizational structures
  • Successful transitions of employees into new roles within the organization
  • Improved employee morale and greater employee retention through faster and more successful career path progression as well as, employees’ personal investment in building their internal networks and associated social capital.
  • Immediate initiation of developing robust relationships with your existing networks
  • An increase in social capital and agility which directly enhances leadership and influence throughout the organization
  • Access to expert networking strategies, tools, and principles
  • An overall raise in your organization’s networking efficiency
  • Belonging to a diverse and powerful network of professionals who have earned this esteemed certification

Benefits

  • Establishes individuals as a recognized expert
  • Being committed to your professional development is always attractive to employers or anyone you do business with.
  • Increases connectivity and significant associations
  • Elevates social capital and boosts business growth
  • Enhances the development and execution of ideas
  • Improves leadership and management skills
  • Increase sales numbers and expands account relationships
  • Easier assimilation within a new company, team, corporate environment, or community
  • Distinguishes employees from their colleagues and students from their classmates
  • Combats disengagement through creating valuable connections and bonds with others
  • Leads to a healthier and productive lifestyle both personally and professionally

Process

To become NetWorkWise Certified an individual must:

  • Take the NetWorkWise Networking IQ Assessment quiz This will ascertain current networking IQ score.
  • Complete the NetWorkWise Networking 101 course Networking 101: This Is How You Network consists of 14 micro-courses/modules. Upon completing each module there will be a mandatory short quiz to be completed and passed in order to move on to the next module.
  • Receive a passing grade on quiz questions Networking 101 has 14 modules each between 3 – 5 minutes, for an aggregate time of XXX that you can view at your own pace. You will answer 5? quiz questions immediately after each video focused on the content you just viewed before moving on to the next module and is scored on a pass/fail basis.
  • Complete a definitive number of Action Steps The steps and activities that are performed will demonstrate real-world implementation of specific networking processes and activities.
  • Upon completion of the process a NetWorkWise Certified individual receives:
    - The NetWorkWise Certified digital badge to be used in signatures, on LinkedIn, business cards, any self-promotional email, website, brochures and more.
    - The NetWorkWise Certification printable certificate with an official Seal of Approval along with a personal congratulatory letter.

Joey

Certified Professional

Track Your Progress!

5870pts

1130pts to Level Up

Pricing & Registration

The investment to become
NetWorkWise Certified is

$399

What’s Included?

- Access to the NetWorkWise Networking 101 required course and quizzes

- The Guide to NetWorkWise Certification Action Steps

- Associated NetWorkWise tools and resources

- Ancillary items received upon certification completion

Get Certified

Policies

Please note by completing your registration
you agree to the following:

  • Refund Policy: Receive a refund equal to 50% of registration fees upon written notification to info@NetWorkWise.com of program withdrawal. Upon notification NetWorkWise requires that you remove access to online courses, quizzes, and delete any program handouts you have downloaded or received. No refund available after the first 15 days of program registration.
  • Appeals Process:
  • Copyrighted Material: Please do not share any materials used in the NetWorkWise Certification Program with anyone else. NetWorkWise asks that you observe the copyright and do not reproduce or modify materials.

Academics

Financial Aid

We are committed to making a world-class education affordable.

About 80%

of all students receive financial aid

Tuition covered

for undergrads with family incomes below tk-35,000

Tuition, room & board covered

for undergrads with family incomes below tk-65,000

Graduate aid available

based on available funds and academic merit

More About Financial Aid

Financing Your Education

View Tuition & Fees

Affordability is going to be a part of your decision making process. BSMRAAU provides one of the best values in the country.

Calculate Your Costs

The cost of attending BSMRAAU may not be as much as you think. There are a number of factors that can adjust your costs.

Apply for Financial Aid

We award $100 million annually in financial aid. There are several options available: scholarships, grants and loans.

See It for Yourself

Experience BSMRAAU

Visiting Grand Forks is the best way to see what it's like to live and learn here. The state's flagship university sits on 550 acres along the meandering English Coulee, in the heart of this vibrant Midwestern city.

Getting Around Campus

Use the Shuttle

Find routes and schedules for the free on-campus shuttle service.

Use our Google Map with building names and addresses or download a PDF map.

Park on Campus

Parking on campus requires an annual permit or daily pass. Or use hourly pay options in the ramp, visitor lot and metered zones.

Academic Help

Advising & Tutoring

BSMRAAU offers a range of advisement, tutoring and learning services. Once you've declared a major, you'll get advising assistance through your academic department.

Writing Help

Talk about your work-in-progress with a writing consultant at the BSMRAAU Writing Center.

Math Help

The Math Learning Center offers free tutors, resources and peer help. The MALL is also available for MATH 92-112 students.

Prospective Students

Donec sollicitudin molestie malesuada. Nulla quis lorem ut libero malesuada feugiat. Praesent sapien massa, convallis a pellentesque nec, egestas non nisi.

Apply To BSMRAAU

Apply Application

Student Portal

My Portal

How To Apply

1). Apply Online - it's free

Complete and submit your free application. This is the first step for all potential students, regardless of your residency or the type of degree you are seeking.

2). Get access to BSMRAAU

Watch your email for your BSMRAAU user name and password. You will receive access within one week of submitting your application.

3). Upload your required documents

Programs typically will not review an application until all required materials have been submitted to the Graduate School.

Surf City will be open every Friday, Saturday and Sunday till September 22nd.

We’ve teamed up with the Payroll Funding Company to offer a unique funding service.


Payroll Funding provides short-term cash that enables your business to pay payroll on credit (as if paid with a credit card), so you can use cash that would otherwise pay payroll to grow your business with additional inventory, new equipment, hire more people or any other purpose.



WHY?

Many times, a company just needs extra cash to grow and invest in the business, and doesn’t have it on hand because it’s waiting for receivables.


Having unpredictable, volatile, and uncertain cash flows costs time and money – period.


WHAT?

Payroll Funding solves this short-term cash flow problem. When you need cash you just call the Payroll Funding Company and they arrange the date and amount required for payroll.

Payroll Funding is not permanent capital. Its purpose is to level out cash flow and free up funds, so payroll can still be paid while collections are slow, and you can continue to invest in your business uninterrupted.

Payroll Funding wires funds for payroll directly to your PEO on Thursday and you pay Payroll Funding back directly 5 days later plus 4% APR interest. That equates to $0.55 for every $1,000 of payroll funded. A $30,000 payroll costs $16.50. There is a 7-day grace period if a minimum payment is made. Longer terms available up to 6-months.


Since you are a client of a PEO, you need no personal guarantee (your credit is not affected), no lien, no collateral, no up-front fee, and no need to supply additional documentation in order to get approval… there is not even a written application!

HOW?

Simply contact Payroll Funding and let them know you are interested and a PFC professional will call you right away.


PFC will interview you by phone and, if all goes well, you sign an agreement (valid for 1 year) and they will issue you a formal commitment. You then have access to short-term cash whenever you need it.


From start to funded can take less than 24 hours.


* Minimum Funding Amount = $15,000


Contact Steve Ott to learn more today.

Phone 609-924-9394

steve@payrollfundings.com

OR

Please fill in the following fields so we can get in touch as soon as possible

[formidable id=3]
www.payrollfundings.com

Payroll Funding is the short-term investment arm of a family trust. Because it invests its own funds it can make a fast commitment by phone without a written application.

© Payroll Funding Company. All rights reserved. 01/19

On-Demand Short-
Term Funding to
Help PEO Clients
Succeed

PEO Clients often need access to money to help
their business grow and prosper. Sometimes
the need for cash grows out of unforeseen or
unexpected events. Other times cash is needed
to take on additional business. Most of the time,
the need for working capital occurs suddenly
and finding access to money quickly can be
quite difficult. As they say, you can’t easily get
money when you need it!

PEOs succeed when their clients succeed. By
having access to cash on-demand, clients of
PEOs have a way to help their business thrive
when they need it the most. On-Demand
Funding is uncollateralized and doesn’t require
any documentation. PEO clients are “pre-
qualified” in that because they are PEO clients
they have built a level of mutual trust and desire
to succeed. A simple phone interview is all it
takes to qualify and that’s good for OnDemand
Funding for 1-year, so you can use it when you
need it. PEO On-Demand Funding is short-term
or bridge financing and not permanent financing.

Contact us today and get your clients
funded tomorrow!

How Can a PEO Provide Access to Capital
so Quickly?

Because PEO clients you are pre-qualified and
hence there is:

  • NO Collateral required
  • NO Lien needed
  • NO Personal guarantee
  • NO Tax returns to examine
  • NO Credit checks
  • NO Written application

Determination of the funding amount is a simple
30-minute phone interview. That’s it!

© Payroll Funding Company. All rights reserved.

The Xplantr journey

Xplantr Ltd. is an IT Service provider that leads digital transformations for clients by managing and modernizing simple to complex systems, integrating them with new technology and digital solutions to produce better business outcomes. At Xplantr, we’re experts in more than analytics, operations management, and technology. We build custom software from scratch that is fit for your purpose and seamlessly integrates with any existing IT footprint. We understand how important it is to the overall efficiency of your business that you have the right software for all of your company needs.

Global businesses are shifting to digital technology in order to generate better results. Therefore, we provide our customers with integrated Enterprise Solutions, platforms, products and services to accomplish their company objectives, decrease IT spending, reduced company costs and gain competitive advantage.

Our Values

The mission of our company is to assure continued growth of shareholder equity. Provide an environment for personal growth and professional advancement for every employee. Maximize returns on technology investments for our clients by providing solutions with optimum combination of open source and commercial technologies.

Our Vision

About Xplantr

Digital Transformation through
Open Source Technologies

The Xplantr Journey

Xplantr Ltd. is an IT Service provider that leads digital transformations for clients by managing and modernizing simple to complex systems, integrating them with new technology and digital solutions to produce better business outcomes. At Xplantr, we’re experts in more than analytics, operations management, and technology. We build custom software from scratch that is fit for your purpose and seamlessly integrates with any existing IT footprint. We understand how important it is to the overall efficiency of your business that you have the right software for all of your company needs.

Global businesses are shifting to digital technology in order to generate better results. Therefore, we provide our customers with integrated Enterprise Solutions, platforms, products and services to accomplish their company objectives, decrease IT spending, reduced company costs and gain competitive advantage.

Our Values

The mission of our company is to assure continued growth of shareholder equity. Provide an environment for personal growth and professional advancement for every employee. Maximize returns on technology investments for our clients by providing solutions with optimum combination of open source and commercial technologies.

Our Vision

The vision of Xplantr is all about quality. We want to be more than just a usual place of work. This helps us create, and retain our amazing, motivated and inspiring employees, who have the desire to constantly staying on top of the latest knowledge and developments. Our team is committed to deliver the best possible help and the most possible values to our clients.

Our Mission

About Payroll Funding Company

Nulla porttitor accumsan tincidunt. Mauris blandit aliquet elit, eget tincidunt nibh pulvinar a. Mauris blandit aliquet elit.

- Nulla porttitor accumsan tincidunt

New for PEOs: Offer your clients The Payroll Funding Benefit™

Payroll Funding Company, LLC (PFC) offers a unique service only to PEO clients that provides short-term cash to pay payroll on credit (as if paid with a credit card). They can then use the cash that they would otherwise have used to pay payroll to even out their cash flow, pay bills, grow their business, or hire more people. That’s why it’s called The Payroll Funding Benefit™.

The benefit is offered by PEOs directly to their clients just as they would offer other benefits through a similar and simple enrollment process.

Why should a PEO offer The Payroll Funding Benefit™?

Have you ever had to float your clients’ payroll because they had cash-flow issues or were waiting on a big receivable? Are any of your clients “slow to pay” their payroll? Have any of your clients suddenly missed a payroll forcing you to pay it? There are many reasons that this may occur with clients from time to time – even those who may have been with the PEO for many years.

So, the question is simple: Why continue being a lender for your clients? After all it’s not core to your business. The Payroll Funding Benefit™ solves this problem for the PEO by providing short-term funding to help clients even out cash flow.

PEOs whose clients use The Payroll Funding Benefit™ will earn guaranteed fees of 1%. This guaranteed fee carries no risk or cost. The PEO is not liable for the funding borrowed even if their clients don’t repay PFC.

Even more reasons to offer your clients The Payroll Funding Benefit™

PEO clients are pre-qualified for The Payroll Funding Benefit™. As pre-qualified borrowers, there is:

  • No written application
  • No need for documentation (i.e., financial statements, tax returns, etc.)
  • No collateral or lien
  • No personal guarantee needed

A simple phone interview is all that is required to determine approval. Those approved enter into a one-year agreement whereby PFC becomes available to pay their payroll. Based on the PEO’s payroll invoice, PFC wires the amount to the PEO the day before payday. The PEO client has five days to pay back the payroll amount to PFC plus 4% interest (APR), which equates to $0.55 per $1,000 funded. There is an additional seven-day grace period if the PEO client pays 1/26 of the amount of the payroll funded plus a late fee. Longer terms are available.

How do PEOs offer The Payroll Funding Benefit?

  1. PFC and the PEO enter into a simple partnership agreement.
  2. The PEO identifies which of their clients have or have had issues making payroll on time and introduces them to introduce PFC.
  3. PFC interviews each client to determine if they will be approved for The Payroll Funding Benefit™.
  4. PFC is also available to train PEO sales teams or brokers who can then offer The Payroll Funding Benefit™ as part of their sales efforts.

Try the idea out the next time you meet with a client or potential client. Let us know what they think. The Payroll Funding Benefit™ provides you another advantage in a competitive marketplace, while also helping to generate more profit.

Liberty Harbor RV Park

We are OPEN year round for your convenience. The NY Waterway Ferry leaves from Liberty Harbor and runs Monday to Friday to Pier 11 at the foot of Wall Street.

Learn More About Liberty Harbor RV Park

An urban camping experience

  • We offer an urban experience
  • Easy access to Manhattan
  • Close to PATH train, ferries and Hudson Bergen Light Rail
  • Right next to Liberty Harbor Marina

Current Specials

Learn How

Park Facilities

  • Available Wi-Fi
  • 50 sites (water and electric)
  • Dump station
  • Full restrooms with hot showers
  • Restaurant/Bar on premises

Contact Us

Liberty Harbor Marina & RV Park 11 Luis Munoz Marin Blvd. Jersey City, NJ 07302

  • Phone: 800.646.2066
  • Email: info@libertyharborrv.com

  • Park Information

The Closest RV Park to New York City

45’ long Spaces

If the guest has additional equipment or vehicle(s) that does not fit on the site overflow parking is available. Overflow parking is $35 per vehicle or equipment, per night.

Fill out this short contact form below and one of our representatives will get back to you as soon as possible!

[contact-form-7 id="87" title="Park Information"]
Office Hours: inter Office Operating Hours
Monday to Friday
9:00 am to 5:00 pm EST
Summer Office Operating Hours
Monday to Friday
8:30 am to 7:00pm EST
Saturday & Sunday 9 am to 5 pm
Checkin Time: 12:00 p.m.
Checkout Time: 11:00 a.m.
To check out you must physically sign out at the office
when departing. A fee of $40 will be charged for
failure to sign out.
50% of the total balance is required as a non-
refundable deposit in order to secure your
reservation.
Payment of the remaining balance is due upon check in.
Site Rentals: All sites are subject to change at the discretion of
management.
**Winter Season: Individual water lines will be shut
off for the winter season once the temperature drops
below 32 degrees Fahrenheit/ 0 degrees Celsius.
Potable water will always be available from our frost
proof line located at the dump station.
Quiet Hours: 10:00 pm to 7:00 am
Speed Limit: 15 mph within the park and on access roads (speed
bumps)
Pets: Welcome on leashes.
Owners must clean up after pets.
Fires: Barbecue grills only.
No open fires, peat soil burns.
Trash: All dogs are required to be leashed. Failure to comply
with this rule will result in forfeiture of the stay. Please
be sure to clean up after all your animals.
Check Out Procedure:

An RV Check Out Sheet is provided daily. When the office is open it will be located at the Front Desk. If the office is closed, it will be located on the window ledge on the office deck. All you need to do is fill out the information requested and sign as you depart the park.

A Non Check Out Fee of $40 will be assessed if you do not sign out.

**Please also note that our weekly special only applies to 6 consecutive non-holiday days and does not apply to dry camping reservations.

Benefits of Staying at Liberty Harbor RV Park

  • Ferry Service to Downtown Manhattan
  • Easy Access to Liberty State Park, Tours of the Statue of Liberty & Ellis Island
  • Light Rail one block away (New Jersey Only)
  • PATH train to NYC - Closest Station is 5 blocks away (Grove Street Station)
  • Easy Access to other Ferry options to NYC
  • Wi-Fi available to keep you connected
  • Home
  • >
  • Facilities

What You Will Find At Our RV Park

  • 50 sites (water* and electric)
  • Dump station
  • Full restrooms with hot showers accessible 24/7
  • Laundry room accessible 24/7
  • Complimentary WI-FI within the park
  • 24/7 Security On Premises
  • Restaurant/Bar on premises (Open May to October)
  • Restaurants, Shopping & Pubs in close walking distance
  • All handicapped accessible
  • Friendly, helpful staff that can provide you with maps, directions and brochures to get you anywhere you want to visit and best times to go
  • View of New York Skyline, Statue of Liberty, Ellis Island, Liberty Science Center and Liberty State Park from the campsite

Call today - 800.646.2066 / 201.516.7500

Fill out this short contact form below and one of our representatives will get back to you as soon as possible!

[contact-form-7 id="87" title="Park Information"]

Amenities

Welcome to Liberty Harbor RV Park…the closest RV Park to New York City.

See the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island right from the property. How great is that!?

Liberty Harbor RV Park is OPEN 365 days a year. for your convenience and also accept check-ins 24/7 even if the office is closed. The NY Waterway Ferry leaves from Liberty Harbor and runs Monday to Friday to Pier 11 at the foot of Wall Street (does not operate on weekends or holidays). Other Ferry options that run 7 days a week are located within walking distance.

Or you can walk up Marin Blvd. 5 blocks to the Grove St. PATH subway station which can take you up to 33rd Street and 6th Avenue or to the World Trade Center Site.

The PATH train is another great option to get you where you are going. You can walk up Marin Blvd.

Either way... Manhattan is just a 15 minute ride away. Stay a day or two or a week or two…it's up to you. We have maps and directions to anywhere you want to visit and our friendly staff is always willing to help you get there.

You can check your email, pick up a package or send a fax from our office. We even have postcards to send to your friends.

Whether you have a small motorhome, a big bus, slide outs or a tow car...it’s never a problem at Liberty Harbor RV. We do suggest making reservations. We want to make your stay a wonderful experience so you’ll want to come back again and again.

Call today - 800.646.2066 / 201.516.7500

Nearest RV Park to New York City! Open All Year!

*Please note that water is available to individual RV sites but will be turned off to individual sites during winter months.

  • Home
  • >
  • Rates

Rates

Rates and reservations available upon request. The Liberty Harbor RV Park is proud to offer its excellent facilities for just $110.00 per night (plus tax). When you stay with us for 6 consecutive nights, you get the 7th night free (not including holidays or holiday weekends). Make your reservation now to take advantage of this amazing deal!

Deposit for reservation: a 50% non refundable deposit is required at the time of making any reservation. All deposits are final, not transferable and non refundable.

Please note that most of the spaces are 45’ long. If your car does not fit in the provided space with the RV there will be an additional charge of $35 per vehicle, per night. Additionally, the per night fee includes up to six guests. Each guest over and above the six included in the party will be charged a $10 per night per person.

Camp Sites

We are pleased to offer camp(10’ x 14’) sites at our location! Tent site reservations allow for 4 guests and 1 vehicle parking space (4 people to a tent) for only $65.00 per night (plus tax). Each additional guest above the four guests included in the party will be charged an additional $10 per person, per night.

Call today for more information and to reserve your space - 201.516.7500

Fill out this short contact form below and one of our representatives will get back to you as soon as possible!

[contact-form-7 id="87" title="Park Information"]
  • Home
  • >
  • Directions

Directions

View Larger Map

Driving Directions

From the South

Take the Garden State Parkway to exit 129. Follow signs for I-95/NJ Turnpike North. Merge onto I-78 East via Exit 14 towards Jersey City/Columbus Drive. After paying the toll stay drive straight until you come to the first stoplight. After the first stoplight begin to merge to the farthest right lane. At the last stop light, make a right onto Marin Blvd. Follow this road until it ends; the office is on the right.

From the North

Take I-95 South to the New Jersey Turnpike exiting at 14 C. Stay to the right, after paying toll, follow sign for Christopher Columbus Drive. This exit ramp is from the right lane. Follow Columbus Drive (Christopher Columbus Drive) until you reach Marin Blvd. Make a right onto Marin Blvd and proceed south until you reach Liberty Harbor RV Park.

From the West

Take I-78 East towards Newark, NJ. Take I-78 Express lane East towards I-95/New Jersey Turnpike. I-78 Express Lane East becomes I-78. Take exit towards Jersey City/Columbus Drive. Take slight right onto Christopher Columbus Drive. Take slight right onto Marin Blvd. Destination is on the right.

Fill out this short contact form below and one of our representatives will get back to you as soon as possible!

  • Liberty Harbor Marina Resources

ABOUT OUR NEW YORK CITY

Are you tired to being bounced around on the Hudson?...Come and check out the smooth as glass waters off the Morris Canal in Liberty Harbor Marina. While we are located in Jersey City we are a stone’s throw away from New York City. Liberty Harbor Marina is dedicated to providing the best and most reliable services a marina can offer. Our North Canal location provides easy access to mass transportation.

We have our own fuel dock with gas, diesel, motor oils, ice and pump-out, and our slip holders get a 5% discount on all purchases with their saved receipts.

NYC BOAT STORAGE

We have many options for NYC boat storage including dockage for a day, a week, or year-round and we offer a convenient payment plan that doesn’t drain your wallet before the season even starts.

We have been in the marina business for over 15 years and our average slipholder has been with us over five years. Our 60 ton travel lift is ready and able to lift your vessel for a short haul or we can haul, block, & pressure wash it and store it in our completely fenced, video monitored boatyard that is patrolled by our Security Officers (24 hours a day, 7 days a week)

Our “permit only” parking lot, locked, gated dock houses, laundry room and keyed restrooms with hot showers are available exclusively for our guests.

Our friendly staff is waiting to help you pick your slip and make Liberty Harbor Marina your homeport. With our secure boat storage options, you can have peace of mind and convenient access to your boat right on the Hudson. Call today: 800.646.2066 / 201.516.7500

Nearest RV Park to New York City! Open All Year!



Fill out this short form below with any questions or interestes you may have!

[contact-form-7 id="50" title="Home Contact"]

LIBERTY HARBOR MARINA FEATURES

Latitude: 40 42' 44"

Longitude: 74 02' 36"

Found on the north side of the Tide Water Basin (Morris Canal) opposite the Liberty State Park complex.

  • Protected, calm waters
  • 24 hours security/on-site manager
  • 150 slips, length to 100' vessel
  • 30/50 amp electric
  • Dockside water
  • Transient/seasonal/annual dockage available
  • Wet or dry storage available
  • Low water averages 20 feet
  • Pumpout service
  • Restrooms/showers/laundry room
  • 60 ton travel lift
  • Emergency haul
  • Fishing boats go out daily
  • Ample parking
  • Seasonal Restaurant on premises
  • Telephone/mail/fax/Internet service
  • 5 minutes from New Jersey Turnpike
TRANSPORTATION

We provide a Jersey City and New York City fuel dock, which includes gas, diesel, motor oils, ice and pump-out for your convenience. Our slip holders even get a 5% discount on all purchases with their saved receipts. Our New York City fuel dock is reliable and dependable for our customers, and we are dedicated to providing you with best quality service possible.

NJ PATH, HBLR, NY WATERWAY



RULES OF CONDUCT

We extend a truly hospitable welcome to our guests. Added pleasure may be yours when the conduct of each visitor is one of consideration for his neighbors. Since we regard all guests, including children, as ladies and gentlemen, additional rules of conduct are not necessary. We do reserve the right, however, to refuse space to offenders of our park policies.

AMENITIES OF THE NYC MARINA

The Liberty Harbor Marina offers an urban experience at 1/3 the price with almost instant access to New York & Manhattan through the path and light rails. We are a Jersey City and NYC marina that offers everything and more for your marina needs. We are conveniently located on the Hudson, and we are dedicated to providing reliable, secure and dependable services for all of our customers. Come visit and you'll see why our Marina is a cut above the competition.

DIRECTIONS TO LIBERTY HARBOR MARINA

View Larger Map
DRIVING DIRECTIONS

New Jersey Turnpike to exit 14 C…after paying toll take the 2nd exit ramp…it will say “Jersey City/Christopher Columbus ” exit. At the bottom of the ramp you will be making three lefts in a row. The 1st is short just under the turnpike. The 2nd is WIDE to the traffic light and the 3rd left puts you onto Grand Street. Go approximately 8 city blocks to Luis Munoz Marin Blvd and make a right…go to the end, the office is on the right.

[field_director_image]
[title]

MSCI World Ex-USA Index is a market-capitalization-weighted index maintained by Morgan Stanley Capital International (MSCI) and designed to provide a broad measure of stock performance throughout the world, with the exception of U.S.-based companies. It is not possible to invest directly in an index.

Active Share is a measure of the percentage of stock holdings in a manager's portfolio that differs from the benchmark index.

Alpha, used in finance as a measure of performance, indicating when a strategy, trader, or portfolio manager has managed to beat the market return over some period. 

Basis point (BPS) refers to a common unit of measure for interest rates and other percentages in finance. One basis point is equal to 1/100th of 1%, or 0.01%, or 0.0001, and is used to denote the percentage change in a financial instrument.

Beta is a measure of the volatility, or systematic risk, of a security or a portfolio in comparison to the market as a whole.

An Emerging Market ("EM") economy is one in which the country is becoming a developed nation and is determined through many socio-economic factors.

Earnings before interest, tax, depreciation and amortization (EBITDA) is a measure of a company's operating performance.

Gross domestic product (GDP) is a monetary measure of the market value of all the final goods and services produced in a specific time period, often annually.

The P/E ratio helps investors determine the market value of a stock as compared to the company's earnings. In short, the P/E ratio shows what the market is willing to pay today for a stock based on its past or future earnings.

Return on equity (ROE) is a measure of financial performance calculated by dividing net income by shareholders' equity. Because shareholders' equity is equal to a company’s assets minus its debt, ROE could be thought of as the return on net assets.

Tangible book value, also known as net tangible equity, measures a firm's net asset value excluding the intangible assets and goodwill. In other words, it's how much all of the physical assets of a company are worth.

Weighted average market capitalization is refers to a type of stock market index construction based on the market capitalization of the index’s constituent stocks.

Diversification does not assure a profit or protect against loss in a declining market.

Earnings growth is not a measure of the Fund's future performance.

For Standardized Performance and Fund Holdings click here.

Performance data quoted represents past performance; past performance does not guarantee future results. The investment return and principal value of an investment will fluctuate so that an investor's shares, when redeemed, may be worth more or less than their original cost. Current performance on the fund may be lower or higher than the performance quoted.

The Gross Expense Ratio for MRILX is 11.33% and the Net Expense Ratio is 1.02%, as of the Prospectus dated February 28, 2019. The Adviser has contractually agreed to waive its fees and reimburse expenses until February 14, 2021. Fund holdings and/or sector allocations are subject to change at any time and are not recommendations to buy or sell any security. And Management fees and other expenses will apply to no-load mutual funds. Please refer to the prospectus for further details.

eu fugiat nulla pariatur

Our Team

Dakota was founded in 2006 for the express purpose of creating a marketing firm where high quality, hard working people could come and build a career in sales in the investment business. Dakota’s stated corporate purpose is “to grow our talent.” We believe in growing every individual at our firm and we believe if our team members are growing in their careers, our clients will be very happy. Our company mantra is to be a pro every day, which means to perform in a world class manner in every facet of the business.

Thank you to all who attended our NYC Conference.Our next conference will be in
Chicago, June 2020.

Contact Us

Our Team
This is “The Pit”…our Sales Desk. This is where all the activity occurs, where all the sales calls are made, all the conference calls get hosted, all the emails get sent and all conversations get had. This is the central nervous system of Dakota. Please come visit us at anytime.

A Jersey City Institution, is a great place to have your private party or company event.
Several options are available. You can host your event in our lively Main Hall, in our private
Rathskeller Room, or in our tree shaded Garden. If you choose to hold your event in the
Private Room, which also has a private bar, you must meet the minimum spend of $2,500
towards food and beverage combined. There is no room rental fee. If you chose the Main Hall,
the minimum spend is just $500. We also do large parties for groups from 400+ people. Free
Parking, Customizable Packages and Great Prices.

[contact-form-7 id="870" title="One Woman Army Registration"]

The Fourth Industrial Revolution

At Clearbrook, we believe the increased commitment to ESG responsibility is just one manifestation of a more profound change, one some commentators have called the Fourth Industrial Revolution. It marks a tectonic shift in the way businesses and economies operate, incorporating a more inclusive and sustainable model for economic growth. Driven by digitization and the efficiencies of sustainability, the Fourth Industrial Revolution’s emergent technologies, structures and processes will shape opportunity and risk for long-term investors.

What are the implications of ESG for your portfolio?

We know you want your portfolio to have a positive environmental and social impact. But we also know you have promises to keep – real world fiduciary obligations that demand short-term liquidity and long-term appreciation.

The fundamental case for ESG investing: You are investing for a purpose – goals that reflect your fundamental values. Shouldn’t the process for achieving those goals reflect your values as well? Clearbrook has helped clients develop customized ESG strategies that align their portfolios with their values, without jeopardizing the returns they need to achieve their objectives.

The business case for ESG investing. Let’s look at why ESG investing isn’t just the responsible thing to do; it’s the smart thing.

  • You don’t have to sacrifice performance: There is a growing body of evidence that integrating ESG criteria into your investment strategy can still produce competitive returns. For example, the MSCI KLD Social Index was one of the earliest widely-followed benchmarks in the ESG space. Since its inception on May 31, 1994, it has achieved and average annual return of 9.77%, compared with 9.63% for the corresponding [not sure it really can be considered “corresponding”] MSCI USA IMI Index. Risk metrics for the two indexes were comparable (Sharpe Ratio of 1.04 for the KLD vs. 1.03 for the USA).
  • This is where major opportunities will emerge: As the Fourth Industrial Revolution takes hold, emergent technologies will converge with the need for greater positive sustainable impact and sustainable growth. Your portfolio needs to be there too.
  • This is where major risks will lurk: Which sectors, industries and companies are just one crisis away from major financial problems? Effective risk mitigation will be one of the driving investment themes of the ESG era.
  • Your supporters are watching: Your supporters are demanding ever-higher standards of responsibility, transparency and accountability. And your ESG strategy doesn’t just affect the growth of existing assets; it can affect your ability to attract new assets.

What’s the best approach for you?

A commitment to ESG can operate at several levels, from simply screening out “bad” investments to proactive, direct engagement to maximize ESG impact.

Why choose Clearbrook as your ESG partner?

Clearbrook’s fundamental investment strengths can give you an edge in the emerging ESG environment.

  • We have experience across virtually every asset class, market cycle and investment objective: Clearbrook isn’t just a traditional consultant. We’ve managed money globally through bull, bear and crisis markets.
  • We’ve navigated fundamental economic, market and technological shifts before: Clearbrook has managed assets through deepening globalization, the emergence of the internet, accelerating automation, and dramatic shifts in the competitive landscape. We’re prepared for the Fourth Industrial Revolution’s opportunities and risks, because we understand how emergent businesses succeed…and how they fail.
  • We’ve been in your shoes: Clearbrook’s team has been on all sides of the investment relationship. We know what it means to have commitments to meet, and we understand the importance of clear, substantive reporting and communications, and of a good working relationship with your investment committee and board.
  • We’re not newcomers to ESG: Clearbrook has helped clients successfully integrate ESG responsibility into their investment strategies, including transition planning to ensure continuity in liquidity and returns.
  • We don’t look at ESG in isolation: Our “whole portfolio” perspective enables us to develop a customized ESG solution in the context of your total portfolio and needs.
  • We have a laser focus on risk: Mitigating risk is particularly important in times of fundamental changes in society, technology and market expectations.

Your Institution’s Existing Portfolio

Clearbrook’s ESG Integration Process

An ESG strategy customized for your values and your needs

Step 1

Developing Your ESG Integration Strategy
  • Define your ESG objectives
  • Meet your fiscal obligations
  • Identify key ESG themes
  • Develop your customized ESG strategy

Step 2

Constructing and Integrating Your ESG Portfolio
  • Determine optimal asset allocation
  • Develop risk mitigation plan
  • Evaluate and select managers
  • Implement return-and income sensitive transition

Step 3

Developing Your ESG Integration Strategy
  • Monitor manager performance and consistency
  • Monitor emerging ESG opportunities and risks
  • Identify key ESG themes
  • Rebalance/adjust asset and manager allocations as needed

Clearbrook’s ESG Experience

In addition to our global multi-asset class, multi-market cycle experience, Clearbrook has multi-faceted experience in the ESG space:

  • We helped a major university integrate ESG responsibility into its endowment portfolio, while protecting its asset base, ensuring it could meet its liquidity needs, and establishing the accountability needed to attract additional assets from alumni and other donors [link to case study in July 2 white paper].
  • Clearbrook is actively engaged in the development of sustainable direct investment projects around the globe. Unlike many consultants, managers and funds, this gives us hands-on experience with the realities of return and risk in sustainable development [link(s), if possible at this stage of project development]

UIU unique personality rests on the bedrock values of academic excellence, inclusivity, and social responsibility.

A UIU education fosters intellectual inquiry and reflection, personal growth, and a commitment to the world beyond oneself.

During this difficult time, Family Business Magazine is making all of its COVID-19 coverage free to read. We hope you, your family and your business are keeping well.

Easily Schedule Meetings with Institutional Investors

Draft contains accurate contact information on over 3,000 institutional investors

Draft is a tightly organized database of qualified institutional investors built
by Dakota Funds Group, a company that has raised over $24 billion using the same data.

SCHEDULE A DEMO
ELIMINATE PROSPECTING
CONTACTS UPDATED DAILY
IMMEDIATELY SCHEDULE MEETINGS

Are you struggling trying to find new investor leads?

Do you feel like you spin your wheels looking for new investors?

Do you waste trips because you can’t find qualified leads in a given city?

Are you concerned about falling behind as the RIA channel grows?

If you answered yes to any of the above, Draft can help you.

SCHEDULE A DEMO

Get the same data used to raise
$24 billion

Dakota Funds Group, the engine behind Draft, raised over
$24 billion using the contact information in Draft. Since
this database is still used by Dakota to raise capital, the
contacts are updated daily.

Why does this matter? Because you leverage the daily
work of a top sales team for a small fraction of the cost.

SCHEDULE A DEMO

Draft works for all types of Investment Firms

DAKOTA
PRIVACY POLICY


Effective as of April 21, 2020

Dakota Live!, LLC (“Dakota”, “we”, “our”, or “us”) respects the privacy of your information. This Privacy Policy is designed to assist you in understanding how we use and safeguard the information you provide to us in using this website (the “Site) and the customer relationship management software and related information services we provide (the “Services”). Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. By using this Site, you acknowledge and agree that you consent to this Privacy Policy.

INFORMATION WE COLLECT

Through your use of our Services and Site, we may collect personal information, which is information that identifies you as an individual, relates to you as an identifiable individual or, that along with other information, could identify you (“Personal Information”). We collect the following types of Personal Information:

Information provided by you.

We do not require you to provide any Personal Information in order to navigate our Site. However, we need to collect Personal Information if you choose to engage in certain activities on our Site. We collect Personal Information from you when you:

  • Create an account. When you create an account for the Services, you will need to provide us with your name, firm name, email address, phone number, billing address and payment information.
  • Interact with our Site or Services. When you send us any feedback, questions, comments, suggestions, ideas, or interact with us in any way, you may need to provide us with information like your name, email address, phone number, and firm name.

Information collected automatically.

We may automatically collect the following types of Personal Information as you use our Site or Services:

  • Usage Information. Which pages and contacts on our Site you access, the frequency of access, what you click on while on our Site, use of provided information, and when you accessed the Site.
  • Location Information. Information about your location, which may be determined through your IP address.
  • Device Information. Information about the device you are using, such as hardware model, operating system, browser, and IP addresses.

Cookies and other tracking technologies.

  • Cookies. “Cookies” are small pieces of information that are stored by your web browser software on your computer’s hard drive or temporarily in your computer’s memory. We place and store Internet cookies on your hard drive. Cookies enable us to personalize your viewing experience. When you revisit our Site, we can recognize you by the cookie and customize your experience at this Site accordingly. For example, we use cookies to recognize your access privileges to this Site, track Site usage and traffic patterns, identify you and keep track of your preferences, prevent fraudulent activity or improve Site security, assess the performance of the Site, and estimate the Site’s audience size.
  • Google Analytics. We use a tool called “Google Analytics” to collect some information we listed above about your use of the Services. We use the information we get from Google Analytics to improve the Services. In order to collect this information, Google Analytics may set cookies on your browser or mobile device, or read cookies that are already there. Google Analytics may also receive information about you from apps you have downloaded, that partner with Google. We do not combine the information collected through the use of Google Analytics with personally identifiable information. Google’s ability to use and share information collected by Google Analytics about your visits to the Services to another application which partners with Google is restricted by the Google Analytics Terms of Use and the Google Privacy Policy. Please review those and see http://www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/ for information about how Google uses the information provided to Google Analytics and how you can control the information provided to Google.
  • HotJar. We use a third party provider called “Hotjar” for certain type of use analytics. HotJar does not collect any personally identifiable information. To learn more about Hotjar and how Hotjar stores this data, please view Hotjar’s privacy policy here: [https://www.hotjar.com/privacy/].
  • Web Beacons. We and our affiliates and service providers may also employ software technology known as “web beacons” and/or “tracking tags” to help us keep track of what content on our Services is effective. Web beacons are small graphics with a unique identifier that may be invisible to you, and which are used to track the online activity of Internet users. Web beacons are embedded in the web pages you review or email messages you receive. Web beacons or similar technologies may be used for a number of purposes, including, without limitation, to count visitors to our Services, to monitor how our users navigate the Services, to count how many emails that were sent were actually opened, or to count how many particular contacts, accounts, links, etc. were actually viewed.
  • Embedded Scripts. We and our affiliates and service providers may also employ software technology known as an Embedded Script. An Embedded Script is programming code that is designed to collect information about your interactions with the Services, such as the links you click on. The code is temporarily downloaded onto your computer or other device and is deactivated or deleted when you disconnect from the Services.

HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

We use your Personal Information to provide the Services to you, to improve our Services and Site, and to protect our legal rights. We limit the collection of Personal Information to that which is relevant for these purposes. We will not store, access, transmit, retain, or otherwise use Personal Information in any way that is incompatible with the purposes for which it has been collected or stored as described in this notice without your consent. Specifically, we may use the Personal Information we collect to:

  • To provide you with the Services.
  • To maintain your account.
  • Communicate with you about our Site or Services, inform you of any changes to our Site or Services, or communicate to you information we believe may be of interest to you.
  • Provide customer support.
  • Maintain and improve our Site and Services.
  • Defend out rights and the rights of others.
  • Efficiently maintain our business.
  • Comply with applicable law.

HOW WE SHARE YOUR INFORMATION.

We share your Personal Information with our service providers to help us provide you with the Services and perform certain Site functions. We may also share your Personal Information in connection with a corporate restructuring, to prevent harm, to comply with the law and our legal obligations, to protect our legal rights, or with your explicit consent. We also share your Personal Information with Dakota entities and affiliates as necessary for specific purposes in the operation of our business.

CHOICES ABOUT YOUR INFORMATION

  • Cookies. If you would like to opt-out of accepting cookies altogether, you can generally set your browser to not accept cookies or to notify you when you are sent a cookie, giving you the chance to decide whether or not to accept it. However, please note certain features of our Site or other services may not work if you delete or disable cookies.
  • Correct or view your information. You may use your account to correct or view certain Personal Information we collect and which is associated with your account.
  • Do Not Track. We take no action in response to “Do Not Track” requests received from users’ web browsing software.
  • Emails. You may unsubscribe from promotional emails from us by clicking the “unsubscribe” link in the email.
  • Google Analytics. To prevent your data from being used by Google Analytics, you can download the Google Analytics opt-out browser add-on for Google Analytics which can be found here: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout
  • Hotjar. To prevent your data from being used by Hotjar, you can opt-out here: https://www.hotjar.com/legal/compliance/opt-out/

SECURITY

We maintain commercially reasonable security measures to protect the Personal Information we collect and store from loss, misuse, destruction, or unauthorized access. Our security includes industry-standard physical, administrative, and technology-based measures. However, no security measure or modality of data transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

THIRD PARTY LINKS

The Site may contain links that will let you leave the Site and access another website. Linked websites are not under our control. This Privacy Policy applies solely to Personal Information that is acquired on this Site. We accept no responsibility or liability for these other websites.

CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may at any time, without notice to you, and in our sole discretion, amend this Privacy Policy. Please review this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the Site after any such amendments signifies your acceptance thereof.

CONTACT

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@dakota.co

Dakota.co Jobs Page

Be the Best Version of Your Sales Self

Based upon extensive customer feedback and requests, we are proud to launch the beta version of Dakota Jobs.

Dakota Jobs is an online job board that connects investment firms with sales, marketing and client service professionals.

It’s has always been clear to us that there are a lot of talented sales professionals and a lot of firms in need of competent distribution people, but the mechanism of connecting is difficult. Finding someone in the investment industry with specific, relevant and proven experience is almost impossible on mass-market job boards.

We have a great network and receive many requests from both investment firms and sales professionals during their search process. Now, with Dakota Jobs, we can help you find the person or company you are looking for.

For Job Seekers

Create your profile and post your resume

Learn More

For Employers

Post an open position and search our curated database of job seekers.

Learn More

Dakota is the Champion of the Investment Sales Professional

Our mission is to make it easier for investment sales professionals to set up meetings, raise capital and grow their careers.

Dakota’s Sales Intelligence Platform includes several products and services that deliver high quality, unique information on traditional and alternative allocators. We make it easier to find new investors and schedule more meetings.

Built by Salespeople for Salespeople

Dakota was founded in 2006 and serves the needs of investment firms who want to market and sell their investments strategies. For many clients we supply unique insights and information to assist in the fundraising process, for other clients we sell and market investment strategies using our direct sales team. We have raised over $25 billion for more than 40 boutique investment firms across a variety of strategies in all distribution channels.

Our Team

Dakota is an eclectic mix of dreamers and doers. We don’t believe in conventional wisdom. We do, however, believe in a relentless focus on understanding how we can help investment salespeople become more successful. Our business was created out of necessity. Afterall, the more we help other salespeople, the more we will help ourselves.

[our_team_section]

Dakota is based in Bryn Mawr, PA, a suburb of Philadelphia and we have an office in Center City Philadelphia.

925 W. Lancaster Avenue

Suite 220

Bryn Mawr, PA 19010

2300 Chestnut Street

Suite 420

Philadelphia, PA 19103

YOU’VE THOUGHT ABOUT IT A MILLION TIMES

TIMES ARE CHANGING

Our industry is undergoing another restructuring. Do I really have what it takes to remain competitive in this new reality? Is now the right time to sell my practice? And if I do decide to sell:

  • What will happen to my employees?
  • What about those patients who have counted on me all these years?
  • How will new ownership manage my business?
  • How can I stay involved to help success?

BELSONO MANAGEMENT GROUP OFFERS A CHOICE

SELL YOUR PRACTICE

Quick, industry-competitive valuation
Collaborative “painless” negotiation process

FIND OUT MORE

MANAGE YOUR PRACTICE

From all-media marketing services to financial analysis and
reporting, get business-related advice from industry veterans

FIND OUT MORE

ABOUT US

Learn more about the experienced team
well-qualified to serve your business needs

Learn More

NEWS & UPDATES

Read up-to-date industry news and
current or upcoming events

Learn More

CONTACT US

Get more information or
schedule an initial conversation

Learn More

ABOUT US

Our concentration is on building a patient focused, audiology based nationwide chain of hearing health practices through targeted acquisition growth. Our philosophy is quite simple: If you’ve always had your sights set on providing the utmost professional care to your patients, coupled with our proven practice management methodology, financial success will be a mere outcome.

There are many concerns associated with selling your practice. Hearing Health USA understands these concerns and as a general rule, intends to keep in place all that has made your practice successful. For the most part, we would keep your business name and practices just as they are now. In fact, in many cases we’d prefer for you as the owner to stay on board (if you should so desire), and continue to operate the business in a similar fashion you have up until this point. With that said, we will completely handle all administrative, marketing, financial, IT and HR tasks so you may focus on your patients. Isn’t that what you originally set out to do all those years ago?

And, in in the event you are not yet ready to sell (which may very well be the case), you can give us a call to schedule an initial, complimentary no-obligation consultation. We will listen to your challenges and do our very best to come up with a plan to help you achieve your short and long term goals.

About the principals:

Amir Hadar
Founder | CEO

A lifelong entrepreneur, Amir is a proven leader who believes in formulating long-lasting relationships and fostering a true culture of ‘Do unto others’ in any organization he’s ever been associated with.

With years of experience in managing businesses ranging from corporate relocation, to military apparel manufacturing to restaurant ownership, Amir also served as the CEO of one of the largest manufacturer-owned retail hearing aid chains in the USA from 2009 to 2014. Under Amir’s guidance and supervision, the company grew from a mere $7M in annual sales in 2009 to $45M in 2013.

Jonathan Weizman
Founder | President

A second generation industry veteran, Jonathan possesses an unmatched understanding and underlying knowledge in the operational aspect of managing a large scale retail hearing aid company.

In the business since 2002, Jonathan has served in various industry related capacities, and while holding the position of Executive Vice President, handled the marketing and sales responsibilities of a nationwide, manufacturer-owned retail audiology chain of clinics from 2009 to 2014.

SELL YOUR PRACTICE

You’ve worked hard to build your successful practice, and no doubt have many concerns/apprehensions associated with selling your business. Hearing Health USA understands that, and as a general rule, wants to continue and build on what you’ve done to make your practice thrive. Essentially, in many cases we’d prefer for you to stay on (if you wish) and do it just as successfully as you have. For the most part, we would keep your business name and the solid business practices you’ve designed, but we would fully handle all administrative, marketing, financial, IT and HR tasks, so you could focus mainly on serving your patients. And isn’t that what you originally set out to do all those years ago?

Hearing Health USA can assure you of market competitive pricing for your practice. Its two directors have extensive industry knowledge and experience and uniquely understand the steps involved for a successful and partnering transition, as we’ve personally integrated many acquired businesses over the years. We greatly respect the success you’ve created and achieved, and we’re prepared to pay you fairly for it – and keep your legacy alive.

The process is quite simple. There are generally 7 steps from start to finish:


  • We sign a mutual non-disclosure agreement. You then complete a short questionnaire and submit it to us along with your last 3 years’ tax returns
  • We conduct a financial analysis, and you receive a written offer
  • You consider and accept the offer (or we discuss questions to reach acceptance)
  • Hearing Health USA performs its due diligence within the established period
  • Hearing Health USA composes the Purchase Agreement (final contract)
  • Both parties sign the Purchase Agreement
  • You receive the PAYOUT… it’s that simple!

The entire process generally takes about 6-8 weeks.

MANAGE YOUR PRACTICE

Managing any business to profitability is challenging (to say the least), and an audiology practice is no different.

If you are like most other hearing professionals, you may have entered the industry with a certain passion to help people, coupled with the dream of running your own practice. Your entrepreneurial spirit and determination to succeed have helped propel you to where you are today.

But now, in the ever-changing, continually more demanding business environment, having to contend daily with a packed schedule of patients who ‘must see you’, does not leave you with enough time to do both. But for future success, you must – tend to your patients with the care they deserve and manage the increasing industry compliance rules and operational requirements to ensure you lead your practice responsibly. And If you manage to take a weekend to attend an industry conference, you pick up a couple of comparative and new gems to help you think you’ll be just fine. But when Monday roles back around, you find yourself in the same spot. The exciting information you thought you could implement ends up sitting on your desk for months while you’re still too busy juggling the daily schedule. “I’ll get to it one day” you think to yourself every time you look at it. We understand that frustration all too well.

While we respect your desire to “do it all solo”, It may be time to leverage our proven experience and know-how or you may want to simply start by just talking to someone who’ll listen attentively and provide non-biased business advice. Chances are we’ve seen and heard (even lived) your most troublesome headaches ourselves. If you know deep down that there has to be a new progressive way to go forward, and are willing to embrace helpful practice changes – we can help.

Don’t wait to take the next needed positive step!

You owe it to yourself, your patients and your practice!

Call today to schedule an initial no-charge consultation.
